answers.answer: Always be persistent and demand more testing.  My grandmother detected her own cancer, but her doctor was not willing to test her.  She asked to be referred to a specialist and was later diagnosed with an additional cancer.  She survived due to persistence.  If you feel like something else is wrong then definitely keep pursuing the cause.  Keep us posted:)
